tables.labels: CREATE TABLE labels (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), color_hex VARCHAR(7), category VARCHAR(50), usage TEXT)
tables.issues: CREATE TABLE issues (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(200), description TEXT, status VARCHAR(20))
